document.full_text: four deaths during a study of pfizer's new rheumatoid arthritis pill will be pored over at a medical meeting in london this week, as doctors weigh the drug's chances of upending current clinical practice.
document.title: deaths in pfizer arthritis trial under microscope
lines_and_colors: four deaths during a study of pfizer's new rheumatoid arthritis pill will be pored over at a medical meeting in london this week, as doctors weigh the drug's chances of upending current clinical practice.
